name: Aetherocks
description:
# Aether Cave

Hello! This is our entry for the 49 LD jam! You're a miner in a magical cave that's starting to collapse. There's a magical fire keeping the cave from collapsing, but you need to keep it fed with the very resource you need to extract. Up to you to keep the cave from collapsing and extracting as much Aether as possible!
